org.jlinalg
Interface IRingElementFactory<RE extends IRingElement>

Type Parameters:
RE - the type of the ring elements to be creates
All Known Implementing Classes:
BigDecimalWrapperFactory, Complex.ComplexFactory, DoubleWrapper.DoubleWrapperFactory, F2.F2Factory, FieldPAbstractFactory, FieldPBigFactory, FieldPLongFactory, PolynomialFactory, Rational.RationalFactory, RingElementFactory
public interface IRingElementFactory<RE extends IRingElement>

The interface defining the factory for ring elements.

Author:
Georg Thimm
